[console_scripts]

unicore-cwl-runner = pyunicore.cwl.cwltool:main

unicore-port-forwarder = pyunicore.forwarder:main

[fs.opener]

uftpmount = pyunicore.uftp.uftpmountfs:UFTPMountOpener
